name: Underworld Taxi Service
description:
This was made in 2 days

The webgl build graphics was all messed up so we removed it.

You play as Charon, ferryman of the underworld. Your job is to pick up souls along the river Styx and deliver them to their destinations.

Controls:

WASD to move

E to pick up a fare (when you're in the circle).

We didn't get to finish all the things we wanted, so it is what it is.
